name: Cloptions
tagline: Easy command line options for C++ scripts. Include the 'CLOptions.h' header to allow simple definitions of command line options through the 'getopt' framework. The '-h' and '-help' options are constructed for you to make printing usage text for your code extremely simple. Checkout the code samples in the 'examples' directory for samples.
